sublevel.description: Partially subterranean facility built into Io's crust
sublevel.securityLevel: High - specialized access limited to essential personnel

keyLocations.significance: Source of all radiation shielding compounds
keyLocations.secrets: Bacteria showing unusual mutations since Great Attractor appearance

keyLocations.name: Shield Synthesis Lab
keyLocations.function: Processing of bacterial compounds into usable shields

environmentalFactors.atmosphere: Specialized mixture optimized for bacterial growth

primaryLandingField.description: Reinforced plateau with landing pads and vehicle storage
primaryLandingField.hazardLevel: Moderate - protected from minor volcanic activity
primaryLandingField.uniqueFeatures: Radiation shielding grid embedded in surface

mainMiningComplex.description: Massive industrial operation with multiple drilling sites
mainMiningComplex.significance: Primary resource generation for station economy
mainMiningComplex.uniqueFeatures: Built to partially collapse and rebuild after major seismic events

yellowFlats.description: Vast expanse of solidified sulfur deposits
yellowFlats.significance: Most stable terrain for long-distance surface travel
yellowFlats.uniqueFeatures: Used for unofficial races and competitions among surface crews

theCaldera.description: Massive volcanic crater with active lava lake
theCaldera.hazardLevel: Extreme - immediate death without specialized protection
theCaldera.significance: Major source of geological data and early warning for activity
theCaldera.uniqueFeatures: Eruptions create distinctive sulfur lightning visible station-wide

darksideOutpost.description: Small facility on Jupiter-facing side of Io
darksideOutpost.hazardLevel: Extreme - highest radiation exposure on moon

darksideOutpost.uniqueFeatures: Only fully automated surface facility, requires drone maintenance

theNeedles.description: Forest of sulfur spires created by unusual volcanic processes
theNeedles.hazardLevel: High - unstable formations and unpredictable gas vents
theNeedles.significance: Navigation landmark and unofficial meeting point
theNeedles.uniqueFeatures: Natural formations create electromagnetic interference with tracking systems

jupiterShadow.description: Location where Jupiter eclipses the sun, creating rare darkness on Io

jupiterShadow.greatAttractorEffect: Shadow period extending by approximately 4 seconds per orbit

shimmerfault.description: Fissure in surface with visible spacetime distortion effects
shimmerfault.significance: First physical manifestation of Great Attractor influence
anomalies: Objects appear on both sides simultaneously
Time dilation measurable with standard equipment
shimmerfault.greatAttractorEffect: Focal point for increasing gravitational anomalies

echoBasin.description: Depression where sounds repeat with increasing intensity
echoBasin.location: 56km from main station in mountainous region
echoBasin.significance: Used by surface teams for emergency communication
echoBasin.greatAttractorEffect: Echoes now contain infrasonic components causing psychological effects

pillarOfIo.description: Perfectly vertical sulfur formation, impossibly balanced
pillarOfIo.location: 104km from main station, only accessible during quiet seismic periods
pillarOfIo.significance: Subject of spiritual reverence among Rats
anomalies: Appears slightly different to each observer
pillarOfIo.greatAttractorEffect: Growing approximately 1mm per day since manifestation
